sentences.en: "I wish I did," said Phil Jordan, relapsing into his usual gloom.
sentences.cn: “我要是那样做了就好了，”菲尔·乔丹说道，又像往常一样消沉起来。

sentences.en: As usual, Harriet is trying to stir up trouble.
sentences.cn: 像往常一样，哈丽雅特正试图找麻烦。

sentences.en: As usual, I slept late that Saturday morning.
sentences.cn: 和平时一样，那个星期六早晨我起得很迟

sentences.en: Campese was his usual mixture of flamboyance and flair.
sentences.cn: 坎佩塞和平常一样穿着时尚新潮。

sentences.en: I was rigged out in my usual green suit.
sentences.cn: 我穿着平时那套绿色套装。

sentences.en: I’ll meet you at the usual time.
Instead of moving at his usual stately pace, he was almost running.
sentences.cn: 他没像平时那样优雅庄重地走着，而是几乎跑了起来。

sentences.en: It is a neighborhood beset by all the usual inner-city problems.
sentences.cn: 这是个为各种内城常见问题所困扰的社区。

sentences.en: It is usual to tip waiters, porters, guides and drivers.
sentences.cn: 给服务员、行李搬运工、导游和司机小费是惯例。

sentences.en: Jose, as usual, had climbed a tree to keep watch.
sentences.cn: 乔斯像往常一样爬到树上放哨。

sentences.en: Make a cheese sauce in the usual way.
sentences.cn: 按通常的做法做奶酪酱。

sentences.en: She ate twice as much as usual.
sentences.cn: 她吃了平时食量两倍的东西。

sentences.en: The police say they met the usual wall of silence.
sentences.cn: 警方称他们像往常一样碰了壁，没人吭气。

sentences.en: The Queen was determined to show it was business as usual.
sentences.cn: 女王决定表现出一切正常的样子。

sentences.en: There was all the usual humbug and obligatory compliments from ministers.
sentences.cn: 全都是些部长们常说的骗人鬼话和少不了的奉承恭维。

sentences.en: They have the usual quota of human weaknesses, no doubt.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，他们身上也有人所共有的弱点。

sentences.en: Today, as usual, he was wearing a three-piece suit.
sentences.cn: 像往常一样，他今天穿的是三件套。

sentences.en: Tommy Tune gives the choreography his usual class and zip.
sentences.cn: 汤米·图恩在编排的舞蹈中注入其一贯的优雅和活力。

sentences.en: With medication, life at home goes on as usual.
sentences.cn: 接受药物治疗后，家里的生活还能一切如常。

phrases.tran_cn: 照例：和平常或习惯一样

trans.tran_cn: 通常的，常有的，常见的，平常的，普通的，平时的，平日的，一向的，老是那一套的
trans.tran_en: happening, done, or existing most of the time or in most situations
